summary: Adds 3 pairs of strappy stiletto sandals to the game. Shoe meshes and textures are completely custom. They come in Black, White and Silver. Requires NetImmerse Overide. Also contains equippable toenail polish in 4 colors, Red, Black, Pink and French Polish. Use help Myrtle for the shoes and help Toe for the polish, in the console.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 3 pairs of strappy stiletto sandals to the game. They come in Black, White and Silver. Requires NetImmerse Overide. If you have RaceMenu you already have this. Otherwise you can d\l it directly here https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37481. Also contains equippable toenail polish in 4 colors, Red, Black, Pink  and French Polish. Use help Myrtle to find the shoes and help Toe for the polish, in the console.

The toenail polish is fitted specifically for these shoes. It willl work with Arison_C's Charming High Heels. It is unlikely to work with any other heels. It will not work for bare feet.

There is a file in the misc section that will add high heel sound to the shoes. It is a replacement .esp. It requires one of the main files. It also requires the High Heel sound mod from Loverslab. You must install this first or this file will crash your game.


Changelog V1.1
Desaturate environmental mask for shoes ... apparently green doesn't work very well in a grey scale map.
Reduce Specular Level in Shoes and nails
Assign specific flag and threshold to alpha properties ... cause just tossing one on a trishape and " YOLO whatever nifskope wants to do will be fine " didn't have the correct result.
Adjust NIO height from 6 to 6.5 ... so now is it fine, does it clip, does it float? how are you supposed to know? Do flat level surfaces even exist in Skyrim?  ... I think it is better.
author: Frank
